<section data-style="text-align: justify; line-height: 1.75em; white-space: normal;color: rgb(63, 63, 63); font-size: 14px;" class="" style="margin-top: -16px; padding: 30px 15px 15px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; border: 2px solid rgb(255, 129, 36); word-wrap: break-word !important;">
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);">php微信支付接口开发程序讲解</p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);">微信支付接口现在也慢慢的像支付宝一个可以利用api接口来实现第三方网站或应用进行支付了，</p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);">下文整理了一个php微信支付接口开发程序并且己测试，有兴趣的朋友可进入参考。</p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);"><strong>必要条件：</strong></p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);">appid //公众号后台开发者中心获得（和邮件内的一样） &nbsp; mchid//邮件内获得 &nbsp;key//商户后台自己设置 &nbsp;appsecret //公众号开发者中心获得</p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);">两个证书文件，邮件内获得&nbsp;<span style="background-color: rgb(253, 234, 218);">apiclient_cert.pem &nbsp; apiclient_key.pem</span></p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);"><strong>注意事项：</strong></p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);">公众号后台微信支付-》开发配置-》新增测试目录和测试个人微信号。</p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);">开发者中心-》网页授权获取用户基本信息-》修改成你的测试域名。否则会出现redirect_uri 参数错误</p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);">&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;后续待完善&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;-</p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);">微信支付就绪页面后台自行了三次操作：</p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);"><span style="color: rgb(255, 0, 0);">1.获取openid</span></p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);"><span style="color: rgb(255, 0, 0);"></span></p>
    <p><img data-s="300,640" data-type="png" src="http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_png/QibLP1rpwH8tJEffRXlM59fKoqLErZIYIGzB0w4vIaVTh37xEibYib9y2NWnLmw75UicGO8ho6YobnvwWUEjFxkGMw/0?wx_fmt=png" style="width: 100% !important; height: auto !important; visibility: visible !important;" data-ratio="0.4356005788712012" data-w="691" _width="100%" src="http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_png/QibLP1rpwH8tJEffRXlM59fKoqLErZIYIGzB0w4vIaVTh37xEibYib9y2NWnLmw75UicGO8ho6YobnvwWUEjFxkGMw/640?wx_fmt=png&amp;wxfrom=5&amp;wx_lazy=1" data-fail="0"></p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);">刚开始的时候第一步也遇到问题，没饭获得openid这个和部分服务器有关，demo内用的是curl获取的方式。</p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);">奇怪我的服务器curl一直无法获取到。后来改成file_get_contents可以正常获取了。</p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);">可这并不是解决之道。因为后面还需要用到更多的curl操作。</p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);">看到开发文档里面有一个地方写证书操作需要libcurl 7.20.1以上版本，然后我就一直在整服务器想把linux的php curl版本提高。最后面我是换到了另外一台windows服务器就好了。</p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);">先暂时这样吧，下次需要用的时候再调试。</p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);"><span style="color: rgb(255, 0, 0);">第二步：获取与支付订单号id</span></p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);">代码如下</p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);"><span style="color: rgb(255, 0, 0);"></span></p>
    <p><img data-s="300,640" data-type="png" src="http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_png/QibLP1rpwH8tJEffRXlM59fKoqLErZIYIEbiboDvbxDWIExXb8C02G7MvAxtabiaehQHyyr81ficC2A0gpur6SMbmg/0?wx_fmt=png" style="width: 636px !important; height: 444.6829268292683px !important;" data-ratio="0.6991869918699187" data-w="861" _width="100%" src="data:image/png;base64,"></p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);">这一步也遇到非常多的问题。</p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);">首先微信支付测试比较困难，只有在微信内才可以测试。我就用手机刷来刷去。</p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);">其次使用var_dump调试也不好使额。打印一些 xml格式的文件只显示字符长度，不显示内容。于是用log的形式写在服务器上调试，log代码：</p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);">代码如下</p>
    <p><img data-s="300,640" data-type="png" src="http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_png/QibLP1rpwH8tJEffRXlM59fKoqLErZIYIlZuqnyeB6XDZgdGwRIdMesFrQe4d3MhiaD18NEmaibvuHyghTeQ2zVSA/0?wx_fmt=png" style="width: 636px !important; height: 147.0520231213873px !important;" data-ratio="0.23121387283236994" data-w="865" _width="100%" src="data:image/png;base64,"></p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);">在demo里面的 WxPayPubHelper.php 里面 用 $this-&gt;log_d(xxx);调用。</p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);">刚开始的时候由于给我的mchid和 appid不匹配一直报错。。是他们给错我账号了。刚开始我也不懂乱试。这一步的调试在 getPrepayId（）内 var_dump($this-&gt;result); 就能看到错误代码。</p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);">第三步：生成支付前端 js代码就绪到网页上：</p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);">代码如下</p>
    <p><img data-s="300,640" data-type="png" src="http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_png/QibLP1rpwH8tJEffRXlM59fKoqLErZIYIVMhkicEWQUwgdEyWyBAmvSKSiaYBLFNcWHdiaWFCdfOVqqqwrfHAjmoRA/0?wx_fmt=png" style="width: 636px !important; height: 62.78745644599303px !important;" data-ratio="0.09872241579558652" data-w="861" _width="100%" src="data:image/png;base64,"></p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);"><span style="background-color: rgb(253, 234, 218);">&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;-点击前往支付&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;-</span></p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);">
        <br>
    </p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);">这部分又遇到了问题：</p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);"><span style="background-color: rgb(253, 234, 218);">android返回&amp;ldquo;System：Access_denied&amp;rdquo;，ios返回&amp;rdquo;access_control:not_allowed&amp;rdquo;</span></p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);">搜了很多百度。其实早就看到了这个东西一直没注意！</p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);">发起授权请求的页面必须是在授权目录下的页面，而不能是存在与子目录中。否则会返回错误</p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);">支付文件我放在了/域名/pay/demo/</p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);">刚开始的时候我一直是到/域名/pay/结尾以为就可以了。支持子目录，结果是不行的！。</p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);"><span style="background-color: rgb(253, 234, 218);">&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;最后看下图&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;</span></p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);">
        <br>
    </p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);"><span style="color: rgb(255, 0, 0);">wxpay1</span></p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);"><span style="color: rgb(255, 0, 0);">wxpay3</span></p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);"><span style="color: rgb(255, 0, 0);">wxpay2</span>&nbsp;</p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);">
        <br>
    </p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);"><span style="background-color: rgb(253, 234, 218);">&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;ndash;流程中的xmljs&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;mdash;&amp;ndash;</span></p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);">待提交生成与支付订单id：</p>
    <p style="font-size: 14px; list-style: none outside none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 26px; white-space: normal; text-align: left; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);">代码如下</p>
    <p><img data-s="300,640" data-type="png" src="http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_png/QibLP1rpwH8tJEffRXlM59fKoqLErZIYI0H8X265vnQsW5Wyvia3QHdcZdic3sex3Bvicjfz35yNMqI3icUG1C9xXicw/0?wx_fmt=png" style="width: 100% !important; height: auto !important; visibility: visible !important;" data-ratio="1.2291666666666667" data-w="768" _width="100%" src="http://mmbiz.qpic.cn/mmbiz_png/QibLP1rpwH8tJEffRXlM59fKoqLErZIYI0H8X265vnQsW5Wyvia3QHdcZdic3sex3Bvicjfz35yNMqI3icUG1C9xXicw/640?wx_fmt=png&amp;wxfrom=5&amp;wx_lazy=1" data-fail="0"></p>
</section>
